page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF {JILLIAN!} { I get up at 7.30am,and I go down stairs and I eat my breakfast.Then I get ready for school,but sometimes I have to feed the pet lambs because I live on a farm.I get my bike out and cycle out to the road end it is one mile.When I get there I leave my bike at Mrs Clellands.Then I get the mini bus to school.We start school at 9.00am and we get a playtime at 10.40am we play different games,I play hightig and kicking out the cat.We get our lunch at 12.15pm I get pack lunches every day,I have rolls,biscuits and I get a flask of juice for my lunch.
